description.value:
Your shadow wriggles before spreading out from you, forming a gateway of clinging, consuming shadow through which the horrors of another plane can barely be seen. The first time each turn you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Sustain a Spell]{Sustain the Spell}, the radius increases by 5 feet. Each enemy that enters the area or begins its turn in the area takes [[/r 2d6[negative]]] damage and must attempt a Reflex save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature sinks partially into the shadow, taking half damage and a -5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for as long it remains in the area.

Failure As success, but the creature takes full damage and a 10-foot circumstance penalty.

Critical Failure The creature is absorbed into the shadows, where it can be seen below the surface; it takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Escape]{Escapes}.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by [[/r {1d6}[negative]]].
